meta.content: The Humboldt County Office of Education is closely monitoring developments related to the worldwide COVID-19 (Coronavirus) outbreak.

div.p: This page is a resource for families and school administrators regarding the Coronavirus (COVID-19). As long as we are able, updates and school closure information will be posted here. You can also find information on HCOE’s official Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram pages.
